content: अभिहत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Struck(<ab>fig.</ab> also), beaten, smitten, attacked, injured; धाराभिरातप इवाभिहतं सरोजं <ls>M. 5. 3</ls>, <ls>Amaru. 2</ls>; struck against (as sound); <ls>Śik. 9.</ls> {@--2@} Struck, affected, overcome; शोक°, काम°, दुःख°, क्षुत्तृषा°. {@--3@} Obstructed. {@--4@} (In math.) Multiplied; अन्योन्यहाराभिहतौ हरांशौ <ls>Līlā.</ls>
